markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Lamia Matriarch](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3078)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The brilliant and powerful lamia matriarchs possess boundless ambition, always seeking to bring more people and territory into the clutches of their kind. Consequently, they become rulers of other lamia. For all their cruelty toward other creatures, they're fierce protectors of other lamia, and consequently, they quickly come to rule cults or warbands. Regardless of the lamia's gender, these ascended lamias are always known as matriarchs. A lamia matriarch is set apart from their kindred by the occult power they pursue, and some have even had grand designs to break the animalistic curse that transformed them. However, every attempt so far has led to the matriarch's fall.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 24

**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Lamia_Matriarch.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Lamia Matriarch](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3078)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=547" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 215 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +15; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Chthonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=114), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Cult Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +15, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +20, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +20, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +17, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +16, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +3

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2829) [scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=393)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +17 

+1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=644)
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 135

</row>

**Immunities**
[controlled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=64)

**Resistances**
[mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647) 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 30 feet, swim 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_scimitar_ +19 ([forceful +2](/Traits.aspx?ID=75), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 2d6+10 slashing

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 28
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Telekinetic Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=1715)
- **1st**
[Bless](/Spells.aspx?ID=25), [Force Barrage](/Spells.aspx?ID=1536), [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [Illusory Creature](/Spells.aspx?ID=158), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (4 slots)
- **3rd**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=104), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194) (4 slots)

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 28
- **1st**
[Ventriloquism](/Spells.aspx?ID=356) (at will)
- **2nd**
[Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) (at will), [Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=160) (at will), [Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28)
- **4th**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) (×3), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) (×3), [Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=55)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127)) The lamia matriarch can take on the appearance of a Medium [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=628). This doesn't change their Speed or their attack and damage modifiers with their Strikes, but it does prevent them from using their cursed touch. Each lamia matriarch has a fixed humanoid form that resembles their upper torso when in their true form. This is the only humanoid form they can adopt using this ability.

**Matriarch's Caress** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The lamia touches a creature, who must succeed at a DC 28 Will save or become [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=94). If the target fails additional saves against this ability, the condition value increases by 2 (to a maximum of stupefied 4). This condition value decreases by 1 every 24 hours.

**Scimitar Storm** <actions string="Three Actions" />  The lamia matriarch makes a scimitar attack against each enemy within reach. Each attack counts toward their multiple attack penalty, but the penalty does not increase until after all the attacks. The first enemy they damage is subject to Matriarch's Caress.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-436" />
name: Lamia Matriarch
